job description:
Category : Information Technology
Location/City : NY - New York
Date Created : 8/21/2015 9:01:17 AM

Kinetix TechnologyÂ• is a national IT professional services company that helps companies drive performance by delivering custom IT consulting and professional services. Kinetix Technology provides clients with top-quality IT consultants and technologists in two core areas of Information Technology across the Software Development Lifecycle ("SDLC"), Business Intelligence ("BI") and Data Management. Kinetix provides skilled applications professionals for all phases of the SDLC. Kinetix consultants specialize in specific technologies and job functions, as well as industry verticals, enabling them to respond to the unique needs of each client. Kinetix's BI offering assists clients in building and deploying architecturally sound, evolvable enterprise-scale information and interoperability architecture, by providing expert consultants or teams. Kinetix Technology provides consultants on a consulting, and staff augmentation engagements, in contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire positions.Our Client, an industry leader in regulatory compliance within the Capital Markets, has an immediate need for a Data Systems Analyst. The Analyst will work with a high performing, senior level team on the creation of predictive analytics and models, and work to reverse engineer specifications for financial surveillance initiatives. The Analyst will work hands on using SQL with large sets of raw data, and will be responsible for understanding business area needs and challenges from the technology perspective, and creating business requirement documents that help shape a solution.
Responsibilities: The Analyst is responsible for understanding business area needs and challenges from the technology perspective, and creating business requirement documents that help shape a solution. Compile logical business requirement specifications, including business process flows and rules. Serve as a requirements liaison between various functional and technical teams to clarify requirements, as needed. Reverse engineer specifications for programs that have inadequate historical documentation. Perform data analysis and ad hoc query development to assist with internal and external data reporting needs.
Education/Experience Requirements: Bachelor's Degree (preferably in business or computer science) or equivalent work experience. Minimum of 6 years of professional work experience in data analysis, validation and requirements documentation, in options, equities and fixed income trading for hedge funds, broker-dealers, trading firms or investment banking. Proficient at technical business writing, including business requirement specifications, workflows, use-cases and other forms of systems documentation. Experience with Oracle Databases required. Knowledge of Access and PL/SQL required. Ability to reverse engineer SQL code is required. Strong written and verbal technical communication skills. Should be proactive, well-organized and able to handle competing priorities. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment independently, at times. Writing samples will be required for this position. Programming background is preferred.Kinetix is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, disability, age, military or veteran status, and other characteristics protected under federal, state and local law.
